name: Lucky Plinko 2
description:
Play the brand new FREE Plinko game every day - 100% risk-free with Lucky Plinko2
Join the millions of people playing Lucky Plinko2! Relax and collect big prizes! With a little luck and skill you could become the next Millionaire!

How to play?

Classic Mode
- Choose 1 location on the wall to drop coins.
- Coins will reach 5 baskets with different rewards
- Push the coins off the board, and the prizes will go into your account!
- Roulette will start when coins go into the yellow box

Crazy Mode
- Choose 1 location on the wall to drop money balls.
- When coins drop into all baskets you will enter crazy mode.
- Push the coins off the board, and the prizes will go into your account!
- The slots machine with BIG PRIZE will start when coins go into the yellow box 5 times!

Feature
- One tap and easy control
- 1000+ exciting levels.
- Beautiful graphics and animation.
- Addictive gameplay.
- Excellent time killer game.

STOP hesitating and join us! the more you play, the more you win!

*This game does not cost any real money.
*Apple Inc. does not sponsor, nor in any way affiliated with Lucky Plinko2.
